00016         class Chain
00017         {
00018             public:
00019                 static Chain_ptr make(HandlerMap_ptr handlerMap, const std::string& eventIdPrefix)
00020                 {
00021                     return boost::make_shared<Chain>(handlerMap, eventIdPrefix);
00022                 }
00023 
00024                 static const std::string nextEventId(Event_ptr event)
00025                 {
00026                     const std::string& eventid = event->eventid();
00027                     unsigned prefixOffset = eventid.length() - 3;
00028                     std::string prefix = eventid.substr(0, prefixOffset);
00029                     std::string suffix = eventid.substr(prefixOffset, eventid.length());
00030                     //std::cerr << prefix << std::endl;
00031                     //std::cerr << suffix << std::endl;
00032                     unsigned index = boost::lexical_cast<unsigned>(suffix);
00033                     //std::cerr << index << std::endl;
00034                     return createEventId(prefix, index + 1);
00035                 }
00036 
00037                 static const std::string createEventId(const std::string& prefix,
00038                                                        unsigned counter)
00039                 {
00040                     std::stringstream strstream;
00041                     strstream << prefix
00042                         << std::setw(3) << std::setfill('0') << counter;
00043                     return strstream.str();
00044                 }
00045 
00046             public:
00047                 Chain(HandlerMap_ptr handlerMap, const std::string& eventIdPrefix) :
00048                     _handlerMap(handlerMap), _eventIdPrefix(eventIdPrefix), _counter(0) {}
00049 
00050                 void add(HandlerMap::handler_t handler)
00051                 {
00052                     std::string eventId = createEventId(_eventIdPrefix, _counter);
00053                     _handlerMap->addEventHandler(eventId, handler);
00054                     _counter ++;
00055                 }
00056 
00057             private:
00058                 HandlerMap_ptr _handlerMap;
00059                 std::string _eventIdPrefix;
00060                 unsigned _counter;
00061         };
